title: tiruvaDit-tuNai
sahitya:
tiruvaDit-tuNai tanai tara vEnum enakku tiruttaNi tigazhum dInadayALA un


anupallavi

  marupaDiyumE nAn piravi eDuttAlum orupOdumE unnai maravAdirukkavE


caraNam    ippiraviyil endan idayam innum enrum oppillAda undan porppadam paNindu
sorpamEnun ayarndu sOrAmal irundu narppadam peTriDum nATTamuTriDavE
